card1.title: Options trading, Forex.
card1.label: Course #1
card1.description: The Options Trading course is designed for more experienced investors who want to expand their capabilities and increase the efficiency of their investments. We will look at various options trading strategies and features of option position management using specific examples.

card2.label: Course #2
card2.title: Investment Basics.
card2.description: Investment Fundamentals course for beginners. If you don't know anything about investing, this course is for you. We'll tell you what securities are, where you can buy them, and how to wisely build an investment portfolio to get maximum income with the least risk.

application.title: Apply for a course
application.text: Our mentors are experienced traders with a deep understanding of the forex market, ready to share their knowledge and strategies to help you achieve financial independence.

card1.title: Personalized Approach
card1.desc: Our mentors work with each student individually, taking into account their level of knowledge, experience and goals.

card2.title: Deep Market Understanding
card2.desc: Our courses will allow you to immerse yourself in the world of Forex trading, understand the basic principles of market operation, analysis and risk management.

card3.title: Emphasis on Psychology
card3.desc: Our course mentors will help you develop mental toughness, which is a key factor in successful trading.

card4.title: Long Term Support
card4.desc: Our goal is not just to provide you with knowledge, but to support you in your trading journey on a long-term basis.

card5.title: Coordinated Support
card5.desc: Our team of mentors is always ready to answer your questions and help you overcome difficulties on the path to successful trading.

card6.title: Knowledge Update
card6.desc: The forex market is constantly changing and we provide our students with up-to-date information and strategies so they can adapt to new conditions and changes in the market.

card7.title: Practical experience
card7.desc: We focus on practical experience. During the training, you will work with real data and trades, developing and backtesting your strategies.
